p: As expected, absolute total, and total saturated and α,β-unsaturated aldehyde levels increased proportionately with oil PUFA content, and clearly >75% of these were of the more highly toxic α,β-unsaturated class. These included trans-2-alkenals [( E)-2-alkenals], trans,trans- and cis,trans-alka-2,4-dienals [( E, E)- and ( Z,E)-2,4-alkadienals respectively], along with 4-hydroperoxy-/4-hydroxy-, and 4,5-epoxy- trans-2-alkenals [the latter three all substituted ( E)-2-alkenal derivatives] (Fig. 1).
